## GitHub Download Module

GitHub archive download functionality.

Handles downloading release archives from GitHub repositories.

### Interfaces

- [DownloadOptions](github.Interface.DownloadOptions.qmd)
- [DownloadResult](github.Interface.DownloadResult.qmd)

### Type Aliases

- [DownloadProgressCallback](github.TypeAlias.DownloadProgressCallback.qmd)

- [downloadArchive](github.Function.downloadArchive.qmd)

- [downloadGitHubArchive](github.Function.downloadGitHubArchive.qmd)

## GitHub Releases Module

GitHub releases API client.

Provides functions to query and resolve GitHub release versions.

### Interfaces

- [GitHubOptions](github.Interface.GitHubOptions.qmd)
- [GitHubRelease](github.Interface.GitHubRelease.qmd)
- [GitHubTag](github.Interface.GitHubTag.qmd)
- [ResolvedVersion](github.Interface.ResolvedVersion.qmd)
- [ResolveVersionOptions](github.Interface.ResolveVersionOptions.qmd)

### Functions

- [constructArchiveUrl](github.Function.constructArchiveUrl.qmd)
- [fetchReleases](github.Function.fetchReleases.qmd)
- [fetchTags](github.Function.fetchTags.qmd)
- [getLatestRelease](github.Function.getLatestRelease.qmd)
- [resolveVersion](github.Function.resolveVersion.qmd)
